name: Hannah Crandall
text: If I could I would give them a zero. It’s very rude employees. Came in tonight to grab a pizza for one of my clients and she was on food stamps. Thought it was really inappropriate to laugh at the fact that she was. Also laugh at the fact …More

name: Brooke Rekus
text: I'm into the pizzas here. They're made fresh and taste great. I think it's nice that they take EBT also. I get coupons in the mail pretty often for this place, which make for a great deal.      I do wish they would put more artichokes on the pizzas that have them.

name: James Melendez
text: Pizza is great! Staff is ok.. but the Tuesday special is almost always gone.. some of the great employees will stretch and make one. Others will not and act like you're a bother. And owner clearly does not care about it's customers. Could have been 5 stars....

name: Barb Szymanski
text: Super easy. Fresh toppings!! Employee was nice

name: Karen St. Hilaire
text: Love Papa Murphy's Pizza! Very convenient and baking the pizza works with your schedule! Great pizza, great taste!

name: Heather Cipriani
text: Well this store is now closed. Came here for a pizza and the windows are all papered over and the sign is gone.

name: Chelsea MArie
text: Some of the best pizza I have ever had. They only pizza to get in the area. The staff was so quick and friendly, I can't wait to go back.

name: Robert H Mason Jr
text: Great pizza to bring home for dinner. Great service. Price is Right!

name: Nano Paulson
text: Rude. I wish my experience was different because I like to try new types of pizza. I called to ask about the take n' bake pizza. The employee was very short and did not answer my question. He was also very rude. I'm fine with sticking to Hungry Howies.

name: Deborah Chadbourne
text: They take the EBT card and make the pizza right in front of you for you to bake at home

name: Mary Beduhn
text: I love the fact that they have $10.00 pizzas on Tuesday any large.

name: Annette Fielding
text: I like the many veggies to choose from.  However the sauce is extremely salty and that added to salty cheese was just too much.  I couldn’t eat enough to get full.

name: Tim Sammons
text: I get it if you aren’t open, but when both open signs are lit and the door is unlocked not knowing what the official open time was I pulled up saw both open signs on, walked in to be told we don’t open for another 20 minutes. Um..... maybe your open signs shouldn’t be on and the door unlocked... what happened to customer service?

name: jamie silver
text: Better pizza then any other pizza place

name: Chad Senna
text: Quick, fast, and great tasting pizza!
